name: Into the factory-DEMO
description:
Languages: English and Spanish

You wake up in a place you don't know. The mirror shows you someone you don't remember.

An investigation game in which you must discover, after waking up without memory, what happened and manage to escape from the place where you wake up. You will have people who have no memory like you. Should you trust them? Find out by playing the INTO THE FACTORY demo.

You can support this project to carry it out or download it for free.
